simplified: 不怕神一样的对手，就怕猪一样的队友

pronunciation.pinyin: bù pà shén yī yàng de duì shǒu , jiù pà zhū yī yàng de duì yǒu
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: bu4 pa4 shen2 yi1 yang4 de5 dui4 shou3 , jiu4 pa4 zhu1 yi1 yang4 de5 dui4 you3

details.simplified: 不怕神一样的对手，就怕猪一样的队友
details.traditional: 不怕神一樣的對手，就怕豬一樣的隊友

meanings.value: a boneheaded teammate can do you more harm than the most formidable opponent
